group_1.textLeft: I'm...scared to meet Alina...
H-Hagumun, do you want to go first...?

group_1.textRight: Huh, wha, I'm scared too...! Can't we decide@using rock-paper-scissors...?!

group_1.textLeft: No hard feelings...?

group_1.textRight: I might hold a little grudge...

group_1.textLeft: Then, to be fair...let's go in together,@side-by-side...!
That way, it'll be less scary...maybe...

group_1.textRight: A-all right...

group_1.textLeft: Now we just have to wait for Mifuyu and@the others to leave...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2][se:7211_souljem_02]...
It looks like they're leaving.
I think they're done watching her for today.

group_1.textLeft: What about Karin Misono...? Doesn't she share@the same room as Alina...?

group_1.textRight: Her grandma's here, and they went out to@the courtyard together.

group_1.textLeft: Then...now's the time...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, now's the time...

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe we have to do this...

group_1.textRight: Himena is too reckless...

group_1.textCenter: Can you get me one of her pet Witches?

group_1.textLeft: So, what is your relazione to I, Alina?

group_1.textRight: Um, we're former Feathers, and we used to@work for you...
We wore hoods, so you couldn't see our faces...
But, it's true, we really did...

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm?
So, have you come here to help me recall@those missing pezzi of my memoria?

group_1.textRight: Um, actually... There's something we'd like from you...

group_1.textLeft: What?
There is niente that I have to give you.

group_1.textRight: But, there is...

group_1.textLeft: If you say that you want to take my life,@then you fools shall receive death.

group_1.textRight: Th-th-that's not it!
We just want a Witch you've raised...
Do you have any left...?

group_1.textLeft: Witches...? I raised Witches...?

group_1.textRight: Oh... You don't remember that, either...
Your unique magic is to create barriers.@You raised Witches in them.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...
This is the first I've heard of my unique magic.

group_1.textRight: Maybe you can use it now that you remember...

group_1.textLeft: ...So this is my magic.

group_1.textRight: There must be Witches inside...

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha, the old Alina came up with some@rather interessante things.
Witches personalmente raised by myself...@I tremble just imagining it.
If there are really Witches in there, then I'll@believe you girls.

group_1.textRight: Then, about giving us a Witchâ€”!

group_1.textLeft: Stop.
I will look inside first before making a decisione.
She went in...! [chara:102901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102901:cheek_0][chara:102901:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:102901:lipSynch_1]Hagumun, let's follow her...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...!

group_1.textLeft: This is...

group_1.textRight: There's a lot of magic... Is it from all the Witches@here...?

group_1.textLeft: Ahahahahaha!!!

group_1.textRight: Eek...!

group_1.textLeft: No wonder the old Alina did this.
Such a fantastico and artistico thing...
This is no longer a matter of rearing creatures,@but creativitÃ .
Ahahaha!

group_1.textRight: Um, so you believe us...?!

group_1.textLeft: Naturalmente, I believe you...

group_1.textRight: Then, the Witchâ€”

group_1.textLeft: However...
It would not do to give out my artwork for free...

group_1.textRight: But, there is nothing we can give you...

group_1.textLeft: You girls are from the Wings of Magius, no?

group_1.textRight: ...Y-yeah.

group_1.textLeft: Then, tell me what you know of my@missing memoria.

group_1.textRight: Is that really what you want...?

group_1.textLeft: The memoria I have are the ones the Union@gave me.
I want to verificare which parts are true.
...Hagumun...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
She might not believe us, but let's tell her...
About what we know of Alina, our former@Magius...
